main event: A police officer in Socorro, New Mexico observed a shiny, oval-shaped object land in the desert in 1964.
interesting points: The object was approximately 20 feet long and 12 feet wide, and was white in color with red lettering on the side.
Two small humanlike figures, apparently dressed in white coveralls, were seen near the object.
As the officer approached, the object rose rapidly and flew off to the southwest at a very high speed.
The landing site had a circular depression in the soil about 10 inches deep and 25 feet in diameter, as well as several burn marks on the ground.
The sighting lasted for a few minutes and was investigated by Project Blue Book.
